description: This file implements the main route/component for a notes application frontend, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes, as well as managing UI state and rendering subcomponents like Sidebar, Header, NotesList, and NotesEditor.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles selection of a note, fetching its details and updating state.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Initializes the creation of a new note by resetting editing state.

methods.name: handleSaveNote
methods.description: Saves a note, either by creating or updating via API, then refreshes notes list.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a specified note after user confirmation, then refreshes notes list.

methods.name: onSearchInput
methods.description: Updates search text state based on user input.

methods.name: onCancelEdit
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and resets editing state.
